summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在 Web 服务器应用程序中实现 ASP.NET 安全性的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to implement ASP.NET security in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由 ASP.NET 应用程序验证用户凭据和管理用户设置，如密码和电子邮件地址。The class is used by ASP.NET applications to validate user credentials and manage user settings such as passwords and email addresses. 类使您能够管理授权基于分配到 Web 应用程序中的角色的用户组应用程序。The class enables you to manage authorization for your application based on groups of users assigned to roles in the Web application. 这两个类和类都使用提供程序，访问应用程序的数据存储区检索成员资格和角色信息的类。Both the class and the class work with providers, classes that access your application's data store to retrieve membership and role information. 成员资格和角色的信息可以存储在 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中使用并类; 在 Active Directory 使用和类，或自定义数据源中使用的实现和类。Membership and role information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the and classes; in an Active Directory using the and classes, or in a custom data source using implementations of the and classes. 配置使用 ASP.NET 成员资格[membership 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)。You configure ASP.NET membership using the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049). 访问使用成员身份的应用程序时，ASP.NET 创建的实例可以使用查询成员身份信息的类。When an application using membership is accessed, ASP.NET creates an instance of the class that you can use to query membership information. 特定于提供程序的实现类包含有关用户访问页面的信息。Provider-specific implementations of the class contain information about the user accessing the page. 您可以创建的自定义实现应用程序类。You can create custom implementations of the class for your application. 配置使用 ASP.NET 角色[roleManager 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b0f6078-4824-4fc8-a5ee-4ae00ee3ceec)。You configure ASP.NET roles using the [roleManager Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b0f6078-4824-4fc8-a5ee-4ae00ee3ceec). ASP.NET 创建的实例类，其中包含当前用户的角色成员身份信息。ASP.NET creates an instance of the class that contains information about the role membership of the current user. ASP.NET 提供了与之交互的服务器控件类和类。ASP.NET provides server controls that interact with the class and the class. ， ，并控件与配合类来简化创建经过身份验证的 Web 应用程序，和控件使用特定于角色的模板来为特定的组自定义 Web 页用户。The , , and controls work with the class to simplify creating an authenticated Web application, and the control uses role-specific templates to customize Web pages for specific groups of users.
